css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:20px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:56px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-1,255,255,255),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:500px;top:150px;left:10%;display:block;filter: blur(70px);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2 svg *{fill:rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-2,242,249,253),1);}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u{row-gap:40px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:300px;top:100px;left:5%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{left:0%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:200px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-1c39778b-u{row-gap:30px;}}
